display.title: Gaze Upon A World
display.description:
You are the Valcon Knight. You have one job; kill the shardbearers and slay the corrupted god of shadow, Umbrocron.

"Inside the strange bunker we found runic inscriptions, the other cartographers thought it was just a different mutation of our tongue, Xatrac, but I realized there were no symbols in common with our variation. It's fascinating! But I can't help but wonder, what happened here? These damn lights keep flickering in the distant halls. No one has been here in years, decades, or I am not a scholar of of this world. I have copied down these symbols in my second journal. It's strange... These walls are made out of a pure metal I have never seen before, nothing can dent nor scratch it. The others have moved on, mapping this place will be fun!"

- Unnamed Cartographer
